messages.text:
Hello iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

bradfitz@golang.org writes:

> Reviewers: iant,
>
> Message:
> Hello iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg
>
>
> Description:
> http/cgi: add openbsd environment configuration
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5016051/
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go
> @@ -37,6 +37,7 @@
>  	"hpux":    {"LD_LIBRARY_PATH", "SHLIB_PATH"},
>  	"irix":    {"LD_LIBRARY_PATH", "LD_LIBRARYN32_PATH", "LD_LIBRARY64_PATH"},
>  	"linux":   {"LD_LIBRARY_PATH"},
> +	"openbsd": {"LD_LIBRARY_PATH"},
>  	"solaris": {"LD_LIBRARY_PATH", "LD_LIBRARY_PATH_32",
> "LD_LIBRARY_PATH_64"},
>  	"windows": {"SystemRoot", "COMSPEC", "PATHEXT", "WINDIR"},
>  }

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=222eeeaa7a3c ***

http/cgi: add openbsd environment configuration

R=iant, iant
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5016051

subject: code review 5016051: http/cgi: add openbsd environment configuration
